snippet.title: Gems Defenders Steam Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
This is raw gameplay trailer as requested by Steam.

Steam Trailer for Gems Defenders. The game I have been developing for last 3 years all by myself will be finally released on 30th of August 2024! Please wishlist the game and consider buying it as it really helps.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2149990/Gems_Defenders/
#game #gaming #trailer #indie #single
